intro.title: Question
intro.description: How might we display the moment when hearing the songs you like in the movies/dramas?

obstacle.title: Current Search Process & Obstacles
obstacle.description: IMDB is the first stop to find out data of movies/dramas. However, it is hard to find by the lyrics because only song names are mentioned in the pages of a movie or drama.
obstacle.conclusion: Therefore, you are probably unsure if it is the song you heard in the movies/drama.

what.title: What’s in the Website?
what.description: Like many products, the website went public when it seemed to work. It was primitive, but inviting search engines to know the content and having real visitors ASAP are more important.

gather.title: Data Gathering
gather.description: Based on actual data, many people submitted the keywords in the search engine:
gather.byLyric: Search the Lyric of a Song
gather.byLyricWithName: Search the Names of a Movie or Drama with the Lyric They Heard
gather.question: Have you ever searched the keywords mentioned above?

grow.title: Growth
grow.description: It’s expected that more creators in love with 60’s to 80’s culture will feature these songs in their works.

prompt.title: Give It a Try
prompt.description: What are the movies/dramas that David Bowie’s Heroes features?
